amendment.description: To increase funding for certain nursing programs as authorized under the Nurse Reinvestment Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 136 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 136 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To increase funding for certain nursing programs as authorized under the Nurse Reinvestment Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 136 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 136 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski.
